description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be be submitted on December 2nd, 2022, by 02:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 02:00pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Canada Gulf region has the requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) \
